member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.ConstPropVariant
member.summary:
ConstPropVariant is used for [In] parameters. This is important since for [In] parameters, you must *not* clear the PropVariant. The caller will need to do that himself.
Likewise, if you want to store a copy of a ConstPropVariant, you should store it to a PropVariant using the PropVariant constructor that takes a ConstPropVariant. If you try to store the ConstPropVariant, when the caller frees his copy, yours will no longer be valid.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies the size and location of the video image on the display of the player.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.Normal
member.summary: Size: original size. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: no, grow: no.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.Center
member.summary: Size: original size. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: no, grow: no.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.Stretch
member.summary: Size: same size as the display of the player. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.Zoom
member.summary: Size: the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.ZoomCenter
member.summary: Size: the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.CoverCenter
member.summary: Size: same size as the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio, but possibly with horizontal or vertical image cropping. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.SizeToFit
member.summary: Size: original size or the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: if smaller than original size.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.SizeToFitCenter
member.summary: Size: original size or the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: if smaller than original size.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.DisplayMode.Manual
member.summary: Size: set manually. Location: set manually. Display resize: shrink: no, grow: no.

member.param: Specifies the webcam property, obtained with for example myPlayer.Webcam.Brightness.

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Webcam.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets all the properties, including the video output format, of the playing webcam. For use with save and restore functions. See also: Player.Webcam.ApplySettings.

members.member:
Applies previously obtained webcam settings selectively to the playing webcam. See also: Player.Webcam.Settings.
The settings to be applied to the playing webcam. The settings must have been obtained earlier from the webcam, settings from other webcams cannot be used. A value indicating whether to apply the webcam video output format (size and fps). /// A value indicating whether to apply the webcam video quality properties (such as brightness and contrast). A value indicating whether to apply the webcam camera control properties (such as focus and zoom).

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Webcam.Exposure
member.summary: Gets or sets the exposure property (if supported) of the playing webcam. Values are in log base 2 seconds, for values less than zero the exposure time is 1/2^n seconds (eg. -3 = 1/8), and for values zero or above the exposure time is 2^n seconds (eg. 0 = 1 and 2 = 4). See also: Player.Webcam.SetProperty.

member.summary: Gets or sets the flash property (if supported) of the playing webcam. See also: Player.Webcam.SetProperty.

member.summary: Gets or sets the focus property (if supported) of the playing webcam. Values represent the distance to the optimally focused target, in millimeters. See also: Player.Webcam.SetProperty.

member.summary: Gets or sets the iris property (if supported) of the playing webcam. Values are in units of f-stop * 10 (a larger f-stop value will result in darker images). See also: Player.Webcam.SetProperty.

member.summary: Gets or sets the playback position of the playing media, measured from the (natural) beginning of the media. Same as Player.Position.Current.

member.summary: Gets or sets the playback position of the playing media, measured from the (natural) end of the media.

member.summary: Gets or sets the playback position of the playing media, measured from its (adjustable) start time. See also: Player.Media.StartTime.

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Position.ToStop
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback position of the playing media, measured from its (adjustable) stop time. See also: Player.Media.StopTime.

member.summary: Gets or sets the playback position of the playing media relative to its (natural) begin and end time. Values from 0.0 to 1.0. See also: Player.Position.Progress.

member.summary: Gets or sets the playback position of the playing media relative to its (adjustable) start and stop time. Values from 0.0 to 1.0. See also: Player.Position.Track.

member.summary: Rewinds the playback position of the playing media to its (adjustable) start time. See also: Player.Media.StartTime.

member.summary: Changes the playback position of the playing media in any direction by the given amount of seconds.

member.summary: Changes the playback position of the playing media in any direction by the given amount of video frames. The result can differ from the specified value.
member.param: The amount of frames to step (use a negative value to step backwards).

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the player also plays images (default: true).

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images.FrameRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the frame rate at which images are played. Values from 4 to 30 frames per second (default: 16).

member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of image playback. Values from 3 to 60 seconds (default: 5).

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images.Playing
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether an image is playing (including paused image). Use the Player.Play method to play an image.

member.name: M:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images.Update
member.summary: Updates or restores the playing image on the display of the player. For special use only, generally not required.

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images.Hold
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the image on the player's display will be preserved when media has finished playing (default: false). If set to true, the value must be reset to false when all media playback is complete to clear the display. Same as: Player.Display.Hold. See also: Player.Image.HoldClear.

member.name: M:PVS.MediaPlayer.Images.HoldClear
member.summary: Clears the player's display when the Player.Image.Hold option is enabled and no media is playing. Same as 'Player.Image.Hold = false' but does not disable the Player.Image.Hold option. Same as: Player.Display.HoldClear. See also: Player.Image.Hold.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.Playlist
member.summary: A class that is used to group together the Playlist methods of the PVS.MediaPlayer.Player class.

member.name: M:PVS.MediaPlayer.Playlist.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the contents of the specified playlist file as a list of file names. Returns null if no or empty playlist is found.
member.param: The path and file name of the playlist file. Supported file types are .m3u and .m3u8.

member.name: M:PVS.MediaPlayer.Playlist.Save(System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the specified list of file names as a playlist file. If the playlist file already exists, it is overwritten.
member.param: The path and file name of the playlist. Supported file types are .m3u and .m3u8.
The list of media file names to save to the specified playlist file.
A value indicating whether to use relative (to the playlist) paths with the saved file names.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.Has

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Has.Audio

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Has.AudioPeakLevels

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Has.Video
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the playing media contains video.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.Speed
member.summary: A class that is used to group together the playback Speed methods and properties of the PVS.MediaPlayer.Player class.

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Speed.Rate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the speed at which media is played by the player (default: 1.0 (normal speed)). The setting is adjusted by the player if media cannot be played at the set speed.

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Speed.Boost
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether stream thinning (displaying fewer video frames) should be used when playing media. This option can be used to increase the maximum playback speed of media (default: false).

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Speed.Minimum
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the minimum speed at which the playing media can be played by the player.

member.name: P:PVS.MediaPlayer.Speed.Maximum
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the maximum speed at which the playing media can be played by the player.

member.summary: A class that is used to group together the Events of the PVS.MediaPlayer.Player class.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaEnded
member.summary: Occurs when media playback has ended.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaEndedNotice
member.summary: Occurs when media playback has ended, just before the Player.Events.MediaEnded event occurs.

member.summary: Occurs when the media repeat setting of the player has changed.

member.summary: Occurs when media playback has ended and is repeated.

member.summary: Occurs when media starts playing.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaPausedChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the player's pause mode is activated (playing media is paused) or deactivated (paused media is resumed).

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaPositionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the playback position of the playing media has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaStartStopTimeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the start or stop time of the playing media has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaDisplayChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the display window of the player has changed.

member.summary: Occurs when the displaymode of the player has changed.

member.summary: Occurs when the shape of the display window of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaFullScreenChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the full screen mode of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaFullScreenModeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the full screen display mode of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaAudioVolumeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the audio volume of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaAudioBalanceChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the audio balance of the player has changed.

member.summary: Occurs when the audio mute setting of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaVideoBoundsChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the videobounds of the video on the display window of the player have changed (by using VideoBounds, VideoZoom or VideoMove options).

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaSpeedChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the playback speed setting of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaOverlayChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the display overlay of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaOverlayModeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the display overlay mode setting of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaOverlayHoldChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the display overlay hold setting of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaOverlayActiveChanged

member.summary: Occurs when the audio output peak level of the player has changed. Device changes are handled automatically by the player.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaInputLevelChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the audio input peak level of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaSubtitleChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the current subtitle of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaVideoTrackChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the active video track of the playing media has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaAudioTrackChanged

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaAudioDeviceChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the audio output device of the player is set to a different device. The player handles all changes to the audio output devices. You can use this event to update the application's interface.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaSystemAudioDevicesChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the audio output devices of the system have changed. The player handles all changes to the system audio output devices. You can use this event to update the application's interface.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaVideoColorChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a video image color attribute (for example, brightness) of the player has changed.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaAudioInputDeviceChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the audio input device of the player is set to a different device.

member.name: E:PVS.MediaPlayer.Events.MediaWebcamFormatChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the format of the playing webcam has changed.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneFlip
member.summary: Specifies the axis used to flip the video image of the display clone.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneFlip.FlipNone
member.summary: Specifies no flipping.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneFlip.FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneFlip.FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a vertical flip.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneFlip.FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneLayout
member.summary: Specifies the size and location of the video image of the display clone.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneLayout.Stretch
member.summary: The video image is stretched across the display of the clone.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneLayout.Zoom
member.summary: The video image is maximally enlarged within the display of the clone while maintaining the aspect ratio.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneLayout.Cover
member.summary: The video image completely fills the display of the clone while maintaining the aspect ratio, but possibly with horizontal or vertical image cropping.

member.name: T:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneQuality
member.summary: Specifies the video quality of the display clone.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneQuality.Normal
member.summary: Specifies normal quality video.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneQuality.High
member.summary: Specifies high quality video.

member.name: F:PVS.MediaPlayer.CloneQuality.Auto
member.summary: Specifies automatic quality video: high quality video if the video image of the display clone is smaller than the original video image, otherwise normal video quality.
